title: How do I withdraw from PESU and get the refund?
content: I got into a better college and would therefore like to get my fees refunded. Can anyone help me out?

comments.body:
You can leave PES, but PES will never leave you.

Jokes aside, you will need to visit the admission department and raise a request there. Carry whatever documents they provided.
As I said, PES will never leave you lmao
DM? I don't want to cause a stir here.
Yo, you can't say that and disappear. This subreddit loves some drama
ayy I wanna know which iit you got
hahahaha well let's just say it's a college that's in Karnataka and not in Bangalore

There are two options 

If u stay out of Karnataka u need to wait for them to write u a cheque, they'll say they need some time(days mostly) as they need to get some permissions or some shit(They'll mail u the refund cheque through mail)

If u stay in banglore u can just go there, they won't give out at that moment itself but u can demand it faster or they'll delay it as much as possible
